mapper.insert:
select message_seq.nextval from dual
insert into message (mno,mtitle,mcontent,sendUserno,recvUserno,readChk,regdate) values (#{mno},#{mtitle},#{mcontent},#{sendUserno},#{recvUserno},0,sysdate)
mapper.select: select mno,mtitle,mcontent,sendUserno,recvUserno,readChk,m.regdate,u.nickname from message m, users u where recvUserno=#{recvUserno} and m.sendUserno=u.userno order by mno desc
select mno,mtitle,mcontent,sendUserno,recvUserno,readChk,m.regdate,b.bname as nickname from message m, business b where recvUserno=#{recvUserno} and m.sendUserno=b.bno order by mno desc
select mno,mtitle,mcontent,sendUserno,recvUserno,readChk,m.regdate,u.nickname from message m, users u where sendUserno=#{sendUserno} and m.recvUserno=u.userno order by mno desc
select mno,mtitle,mcontent,sendUserno,recvUserno,readChk,m.regdate,b.bname as nickname from message m, business b where sendUserno=#{sendUserno} and m.recvUserno=b.bno order by mno desc
